html:
There are currently instant rebates on Samsung external SSD hard drives. A lot of these instant rebates will expire on January 13, 2025, but some look like they will continue past that date.

Samsung portable SSD drives are compatible with MacOS, Windows, Galaxy and iOS. Full specifications are listed below.

Samsung Portable SSD Instant Rebates

  • Samsung Portable SSD T7 4TB $269 (Reg $369)
  • Samsung Portable SSD T7 2TB $159 (Reg $219)
  • Samsung Portable SSD T7 1TB $99 (Reg $129)
  • Samsung Shield Portable SSD T7 4TB $299 (Reg $469)
  • Samsung Shield Portable SSD T7 2TB $169 (Reg $244)
  • Samsung Shield Portable SSD T7 1TB $109 (Reg $144)
  • Samsung Portable SSD T9 4TB $349 (Reg $469)
  • Samsung Portable SSD T9 2TB $229 (Reg $259)
  • Samsung Portable SSD T9 1TB $129 (Reg $149)

Samsung T9 Specifications

  • USB-C 3.2 Gen 2×2 Port (20 Gb/s)
  • PCIe NVMe Technology
  • Sequential Read Speed: 2000 MB/s
  • Sequential Write Speed: 1950 MB/s
  • Sustained Write Speed: Up to 1000 MB/s
  • 256-Bit AES Hardware Encryption
  • Galaxy & iPhone Compatible

Samsung Shield T7 Specifications

  • USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C Port (10 Gb/s)
  • PCIe NVMe Technology
  • Read Speeds up to 1050 MB/s
  • Write Speeds up to 1000 MB/s
  • 256-Bit AES Hardware Encryption
  • IP65 Rating
  • Durable, Rugged Design

Samsung T7 Specifications

  • USB 3.2 Gen 2 Interface
  • PCIe NVMe Technology
  • Read Speeds up to 1050 MB/s
  • Write Speeds up to 1000 MB/s
  • 256-Bit AES Hardware Encryption
  • Galaxy & iPhone Compatible

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
